NUS SOC Print v0.3
GNU GPL v3
Build Date: 13 May 2013
By: Yeo Kheng Meng
With thanks to Yong Quan, Kai Yao, Gabriel and Jason. Hit the about button to go to the website.


Methods of Printing
 
Method 1 (Original from v0.22)
 Tools: pdftops and psnup
 Features: Page-range, 1,2,4,6 pages per sheet
 Issues: When pages/sheet >2, Auto layout is quite unpredictable.


Method 2
 Tools: nup-pdf by rubypdf, pdftops
 Features: 1,2,4,8 pages per sheet. Auto Layout is intuitively better then method 1
 Issues: No page range


Method 3:
 Tools: Multivalent-tools and pdftops
 Features: rows x col, Page-range
 Issue: This method is slightly buggy, may not work on all pdf files. Unnecessary alignment to the left. Portrait or landscape is auto-selected, but I believe the default is portrait.
